lead_paragraph: Former U.S. first lady and secretary of state Hillary Rodham Clinton spoke about the country's longstanding friendship with Israel and the importance of keeping nuclear weapons out of Iran as she accepted a lifetime achievement award from the American Jewish Congress on Wednesday.

headline.main: American Jewish Congress Lauds Hillary Clinton
headline.print_headline: American Jewish Congress Lauds Hillary Clinton
